jobTitle: Life Insurance Sales Agent - Remote | WFH
description:
Job Title: Independent Life Insurance Agent

Compensation

- Competitive commission-based structure
- Potential earnings of $10,000 - $15,000+ monthly (uncapped)

Schedule: Flexible, work from home

Are you ready to take control of your career and secure your financial future? Join a thriving team in the lucrative finance industry as an Independent Life Insurance Agent.

What We Offer

- Work-from-home flexibility
- Comprehensive training and mentorship
- No cold calling - work with pre-qualified leads
- No sales quotas or micromanagement
- Potential for agency ownership (optional)
- Exciting travel opportunities and bonuses for top performers

Ideal Candidate

We're seeking motivated individuals who align with our core values:

- Prioritizing relationships and putting people first
- Commitment to personal growth
- Open and honest communication
- Integrity in all actions
- Positive teamwork and collaboration
- Ownership mentality
- Dedication to service and making a positive impact
- Balancing productivity with enjoyment

The Role

As an Independent Life Insurance Agent, you'll help clients secure their financial futures by providing tailored life insurance solutions. You'll work with pre-qualified leads, eliminating the need for cold calling.

Requirements

- Strong communication and interpersonal skills
- Self-motivated with a growth mindset
- Willingness to learn and adapt
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team

This is a 1099 commission-based position with unlimited earning potential. Whether you're new to the industry or an experienced professional looking for a change, we provide the support and resources you need to thrive.

Join a team that values work-life balance, personal growth, and making a positive impact. Take the first step towards a rewarding career in the financial services industry.

To learn more about this opportunity and schedule an interview, please submit your application. We look forward to speaking with you!
responsibilities: Help clients secure their financial futures by providing tailored life insurance solutions.
